languages.text: {n}Завидев Сороритас, Октавиана замирает.{/n} "Не может быть... не вы ли — та самая сестра Арджента, что наводит ужас на последнюю гниду Футфола? О вас ходит столько слухов по станции! И вот теперь — вы, собственной персоной, в нашем скромном "Амасекусе"!"

{n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"
languages.original_text: {n}Завидев Сороритас, Октавиана замирает.{/n} "Не может быть... не вы ли — та самая сестра Арджента, что наводит ужас на последнюю гниду Футфола? О вас ходит столько слухов по станции! И вот теперь — вы, собственной персоной, в нашем скромном "Амасекусе"!"

{n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum of Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

{n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

{n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナはその場で固まる。{/n}「まさか…あなたは―シスター・アルジェンタでは？あのシスター・アルジェンタ？フットフォールの最低の悪党でさえ恐れをなすあのお方？ステーション中があなたの話しで持ちきりですわ！そのあなたが、生身で、私たちの粗末なアマセックにいらっしゃるなんて！」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナはその場で固まる。{/n}「まさか…あなたは―シスター・アルジェンタでは？あのシスター・アルジェンタ？フットフォールの最低の悪党でさえ恐れをなすあのお方？ステーション中があなたの話しで持ちきりですわ！そのあなたが、生身で、私たちの粗末なアマセックにいらっしゃるなんて！」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana se fige.{/n} « J'en crois pas mes yeux... Sœur Argenta ? C'est bien vous ? LA sœur Argenta ? Celle qui fait trembler les pires ordures de Castel ? Toute la station ne parle que de vous ! Et vous voilà, en chair et en os, dans notre humble Amasecus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana se fige.{/n} « J'en crois pas mes yeux... Sœur Argenta ? C'est bien vous ? LA sœur Argenta ? Celle qui fait trembler les pires ordures de Castel ? Toute la station ne parle que de vous ! Et vous voilà, en chair et en os, dans notre humble Amasecus ! »

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜愣在了原地。{/n}“不会吧……你就是阿洁塔修女吗？就是‘那个’阿洁塔修女？哪怕是整个落脚港最卑鄙的人渣，听到你的名字也会浑身发抖！整座星站都在谈论你的事情！可你居然就在这里！就在我们卑微的烈酒修会！”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜愣在了原地。{/n}“不会吧……你就是阿洁塔修女吗？就是‘那个’阿洁塔修女？哪怕是整个落脚港最卑鄙的人渣，听到你的名字也会浑身发抖！整座星站都在谈论你的事情！可你居然就在这里！就在我们卑微的烈酒修会！”

languages.text: {n}Octaviana erstarrt.{/n} "Das kann nicht sein ... Seid Ihr ... Schwester Argenta? DIE Schwester Argenta? Die den schlimmsten Abschaum von Footfall in seinen Stiefeln erzittern lässt? Die gesamte Station spricht von Euch! Und jetzt seid Ihr hier, in Fleisch und Blut, in unserem bescheidenen Amasecus!"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana erstarrt.{/n} "Das kann nicht sein ... Seid Ihr ... Schwester Argenta? DIE Schwester Argenta? Die den schlimmsten Abschaum von Footfall in seinen Stiefeln erzittern lässt? Die gesamte Station spricht von Euch! Und jetzt seid Ihr hier, in Fleisch und Blut, in unserem bescheidenen Amasecus!"

languages.text: {n}Octaviana se queda paralizada.{/n} «No puede ser... ¿hermana Argenta? ¿La hermana Argenta? ¿La que ha hecho temblar a la peor escoria de Paso? ¡Toda la gente de la estación habla de usted! ¡Y aquí está, en carne y hueso, en nuestro querido Amasecus!».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana se queda paralizada.{/n} «No puede ser... ¿hermana Argenta? ¿La hermana Argenta? ¿La que ha hecho temblar a la peor escoria de Paso? ¡Toda la gente de la estación habla de usted! ¡Y aquí está, en carne y hueso, en nuestro querido Amasecus!».

languages.text: {n}Octaviana olduğu yerde donakalıyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Yoksa siz... Rahibe Argenta mısınız? Şu ünlü Rahibe Argenta? Binliman'daki en iflah olmaz alçakları bile tir tir titreten kadın? Tüm istasyon sizi konuşuyor! Sizi dünya gözüyle naçizane Amasekus'umuzda görmek ne şeref!"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana freezes in place.{/n} "It can't be... Are you — Sister Argenta? THE Sister Argenta? The one who has the worst scum on Footfall shaking in their boots? The whole station is talking about you! And here you are, in the flesh, in our humble Amasecus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, olduğu yerde donakalıyor.{/n} "Yok artık... Yoksa siz... Rahibe Argenta siz misiniz? Hani o ünlü Rahibe Argenta? Binliman'daki en iflah olmaz alçakların bile tir tir titremesini sağlayan siz değil misiniz? Tüm istasyon sizi konuşuyor! Sizi dünya gözüyle naçizane Amasekus'umuzda görmeyi hiç beklemezdim!"
